org.jivesoftware.multiplexer.net
Class ConnectionHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.mina.common.IoHandlerAdapter
      org.jivesoftware.multiplexer.net.ConnectionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.mina.common.IoHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientConnectionHandler
public abstract class ConnectionHandler
extends org.apache.mina.common.IoHandlerAdapter

A ConnectionHandler is responsible for creating new sessions, destroying sessions and delivering received XML stanzas to the proper StanzaHandler.

Author:
Gaston Dombiak
